channel.title: Hello on Brian Greenwood
channel.description: Recent content in Hello on Brian Greenwood

item.title: Liftoff
item.description: Hi and thanks for checking out my website. This blog will serve as an outlet to write about my interests and side projects. I suspect they will mostly be technical in nature and focus heavily on sports, but I’m sure other topics will surface as well. There isn’t much here now, but in the future, happy reading!
